item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-17
item.description: Twitter lets you tip creators with Ethereum (1 minute read) Twitter is expanding its tipping options to include Ethereum.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-03
item.description: Butterfly Protocol and Cortex Application are launching free new .hmn: Web3 for Everyone (2 minute read) Butterfly Protocol and Cortex Application are launching new ‘dot human’ domains on Polygon.
